articles.author: Christoph Hasselbach
articles.title: Why Germany, India face obstacles to closer strategic ties - DW.com
articles.description: In the face of US tariffs, Russian threats and China's ambitions, Germany is courting the Asian giant as a trading and geopolitical partner. But it's not so easy.
articles.content: Top German politicians have a new favorite travel destination: India. Following the recent visit by Foreign Minister Johann Wadephul, Chancellor Friedrich Merz is heading to New Delhi on Sunday with … [+6354 chars]
